bug.author: Selmaan
bug.description: It appears like this code requires installation of the PyYAML package, but this is not properly listed in requirements. After installing deep pose kit following instructions, importing the package results in the error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'yaml' manually doing pip install pyyaml fixes this

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Thanks for pointing this out. If you want to submit a PR to update setup.py I'd appreciate it. Otherwise I'll add this later when I have time to push some updates.
I submitted a PR to update this a few days back.
Thanks! Sorry I was traveling and just got back to work.
